attr.title: Leap Year: March
attr.desc: Continues the adventure for players who have beaten Leap Year and want an even greater challenge. Use the same tools you learned to explore another hand-drawn world that's both larger and much more complex. Master your understanding of game's secrets to complete another month of your calendar.
attr.inst: Purchase and download the game from itch.io (https://managore.itch.io/leap-year-march), extract, and copy game files to leapyearmarch/assets. For less powerful devices (like RK3326), rename data.win to data_potato.win
attr.inst_md: Purchase and download the game from [itch.io](https://managore.itch.io/leap-year-march), extract, and copy game files to `leapyearmarch/assets`. For less powerful devices (like RK3326), rename `data.win` to `data_potato.win`
